noun.definition: The object of a person's ambition or effort; an aim or desired result.
noun.example: His main goal is to become a pilot.

noun.definition: A pair of posts linked by a crossbar and often a net, forming a space into or over which the ball has to be sent in order to score.
noun.example: The striker kicked the ball into the goal.

usage_examples: She set a goal to read 50 books this year.
The team scored a goal in the final minute.
